GSD.product_version: versions from v3.12 to before v5.10.163
GSD.description:
clk: samsung: Fix memory leak in _samsung_clk_register_pll()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.163 by commit da13355bb9961316d124f94dfc7a1385d0fb035a, it was introduced in version v3.12 by commit 3ff6e0d8d64d594a551b5c4904e4b617bf7eee22. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: clk: samsung: Fix memory leak in _samsung_clk_register_pll()
OSV.details:
